thread.title: Amazon Fire TV & Fire TV Stick open for pre-order in Japan, ship October 28 with Prime Video
thread.title_full: Amazon Fire TV & Fire TV Stick open for pre-order in Japan, ship October 28 with Prime Video - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Amazon Fire TV & Fire TV Stick open for pre-order in Japan, ship October 28 with Prime Video
text: Amazon has revealed it’s launching the Fire TV and Fire TV Stick in Japan, its first Asian market and third country overall after the U.S. and U.K. Amazon Fire TV is available for pre-order starting today for ¥12,980 ($110), while Fire TV Stick also opens for pre-orders at ¥4,980 ($40). The voice-remote version of the […] »
